name: Disillusion (dasaxman)
description:
Have you ever had cause to doubt your perception of the world? Thought that there may be some sith sense that everyone experiences except you, but don't talk about it because of how fundamental it is? How would you respond if those fears were true?

Disillusion is a solo journaling RPG that chronicles your character's journey from suspicion to discovery and, eventually, to accept that they go through life differently from everyone else. The entire game fits on a business card and requires nothing to play except a means of keeping your journal.

This was created for the Tiny Library jam, 2021.
